Extbase\Persistence\QOM

Class Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LogicalOr

All Implemented Interfaces:

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OrInterface
public class Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LogicalOr
implements Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OrInterface

Performs a logical disjunction of two other constraints.

To satisfy the Or constraint, the node-tuple must either:
satisfy constraint1 but not constraint2, or satisfy constraint2 but not constraint1, or satisfy both constraint1 and constraint2.

Package: Extbase
Subpackage: Persistence\QOM
